response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that could significantly enhance your life or business. Given its rarity and quality, I understand that its true worth might be subjective to you. However, I am confident in offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to find the right person who appreciates its true essence and will cherish it accordingly. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring how this product can become a valuable addition to your collection or endeavors.", "product_price": 950000}
